overview: By God's order, Abraham was commanded to sacrifice his son Isaac on the mountain of Moriah. While traveling to the place of the sacrifice, alongside Isaac and two servants, Abraham is flooded with vivid memories from the years he and Sarah spent longing for the son they were promisedâ€”the son he must now lay upon the altar.
tagline: His FAITH was tested. Our HOPE was born.
title: His Only Son
